price: 39. Asali lolendo na mokili, ye na basoda naye ete oyo ezali bosóló te, bakanisaki ete bakozongisama epai na biso te.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'takbara huwa wajunūduhu fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi waẓannū annahum ilaynā lā yur'jaʿūna
